00029 namespace glm{
00030 namespace detail{
00031 
00032 //length
00033 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_len_ps(__m128 x)
00034 {
00035     __m128 dot0 = sse_dot_ps(x, x);
00036         __m128 sqt0 = _mm_sqrt_ps(dot0);
00037     return sqt0;
00038 }
00039 
00040 //distance
00041 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_dst_ps(__m128 p0, __m128 p1)
00042 {
00043         __m128 sub0 = _mm_sub_ps(p0, p1);
00044     __m128 len0 = sse_len_ps(sub0);
00045     return len0;
00046 }
00047 
00048 //dot
00049 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_dot_ps(__m128 v1, __m128 v2)
00050 {
00051 #   if((GLM_ARCH & GLM_ARCH_AVX) == GLM_ARCH_AVX)
00052         return _mm_dp_ps(v1, v2, 0xff);
00053 #   else
00054         __m128 mul0 = _mm_mul_ps(v1, v2);
00055         __m128 swp0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(mul0, mul0, _MM_SHUFFLE(2, 3, 0, 1));
00056         __m128 add0 = _mm_add_ps(mul0, swp0);
00057         __m128 swp1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(add0, add0, _MM_SHUFFLE(0, 1, 2, 3));
00058         __m128 add1 = _mm_add_ps(add0, swp1);
00059         return add1;
00060 #   endif
00061 }
00062 
00063 // SSE1
00064 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_dot_ss(__m128 v1, __m128 v2)
00065 {
00066         __m128 mul0 = _mm_mul_ps(v1, v2);
00067         __m128 mov0 = _mm_movehl_ps(mul0, mul0);
00068         __m128 add0 = _mm_add_ps(mov0, mul0);
00069         __m128 swp1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(add0, add0, 1);
00070         __m128 add1 = _mm_add_ss(add0, swp1);
00071         return add1;
00072 }
00073 
00074 //cross
00075 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_xpd_ps(__m128 v1, __m128 v2)
00076 {
00077         __m128 swp0 = _mm_shuffle_ps(v1, v1, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 0, 2, 1));
00078         __m128 swp1 = _mm_shuffle_ps(v1, v1, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 1, 0, 2));
00079         __m128 swp2 = _mm_shuffle_ps(v2, v2, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 0, 2, 1));
00080         __m128 swp3 = _mm_shuffle_ps(v2, v2, _MM_SHUFFLE(3, 1, 0, 2));
00081         __m128 mul0 = _mm_mul_ps(swp0, swp3);
00082         __m128 mul1 = _mm_mul_ps(swp1, swp2);
00083         __m128 sub0 = _mm_sub_ps(mul0, mul1);
00084         return sub0;
00085 }
00086 
00087 //normalize
00088 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_nrm_ps(__m128 v)
00089 {
00090         __m128 dot0 = sse_dot_ps(v, v);
00091         __m128 isr0 = _mm_rsqrt_ps(dot0);
00092         __m128 mul0 = _mm_mul_ps(v, isr0);
00093         return mul0;
00094 }
00095 
00096 //faceforward
00097 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_ffd_ps(__m128 N, __m128 I, __m128 Nref)
00098 {
00099         //__m128 dot0 = _mm_dot_ps(v, v);
00100         //__m128 neg0 = _mm_neg_ps(N);
00101         //__m128 sgn0 = _mm_sgn_ps(dot0);
00102         //__m128 mix0 = _mm_mix_ps(N, neg0, sgn0);
00103         //return mix0;
00104 
00105         __m128 dot0 = sse_dot_ps(Nref, I);
00106         __m128 sgn0 = sse_sgn_ps(dot0);
00107         __m128 mul0 = _mm_mul_ps(sgn0, glm::detail::minus_one);
00108         __m128 mul1 = _mm_mul_ps(N, mul0);
00109         return mul1;
00110 }
00111 
00112 //reflect
00113 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_rfe_ps(__m128 I, __m128 N)
00114 {
00115         __m128 dot0 = sse_dot_ps(N, I);
00116         __m128 mul0 = _mm_mul_ps(N, dot0);
00117         __m128 mul1 = _mm_mul_ps(mul0, glm::detail::two);
00118         __m128 sub0 = _mm_sub_ps(I, mul1);
00119         return sub0;
00120 }
00121 
00122 //refract
00123 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER __m128 sse_rfa_ps(__m128 I, __m128 N, __m128 eta)
00124 {
00125         __m128 dot0 = sse_dot_ps(N, I);
00126         __m128 mul0 = _mm_mul_ps(eta, eta);
00127         __m128 mul1 = _mm_mul_ps(dot0, dot0);
00128         __m128 sub0 = _mm_sub_ps(glm::detail::one, mul0);
00129         __m128 sub1 = _mm_sub_ps(glm::detail::one, mul1);
00130         __m128 mul2 = _mm_mul_ps(sub0, sub1);
00131         
00132         if(_mm_movemask_ps(_mm_cmplt_ss(mul2, glm::detail::zero)) == 0)
00133                 return glm::detail::zero;
00134 
00135         __m128 sqt0 = _mm_sqrt_ps(mul2);
00136         __m128 mul3 = _mm_mul_ps(eta, dot0);
00137         __m128 add0 = _mm_add_ps(mul3, sqt0);
00138         __m128 mul4 = _mm_mul_ps(add0, N);
00139         __m128 mul5 = _mm_mul_ps(eta, I);
00140         __m128 sub2 = _mm_sub_ps(mul5, mul4);
00141 
00142         return sub2;
00143 }
00144 
00145 }//namespace detail
00146 }//namespace glm
